<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Subscribe to the Store events</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/store/subscribe"}></MethodEndpoint>



Add subscription for a store events

## Request

<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"callbackUrl"} required={true} schemaName={"uri"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","format":"uri","description":"This URL will be called by the server when the desired event will occur","example":"https://myserver.com/send/callback/here"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"eventName"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`orderInProgress`, `orderShipped`, `orderDelivered`]"} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Event name for the subscription","enum":["orderInProgress","orderShipped","orderDelivered"],"example":"orderInProgress"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"201"} value={"201"}><div>

Subscription added

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"subscriptionId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"AAA-123-BBB-456"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"subscriptionId\": \"AAA-123-BBB-456\"\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div><div><div className={"openapi__divider"}></div><h2 id={"callbacks"}>Callbacks</h2><OperationTabs className={"openapi-tabs__operation"}><TabItem label={"POST orderInProgress"} value={"post-orderInProgress"}><MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"{$request.body#/callbackUrl}?event={$request.body#/eventName}"}></MethodEndpoint>



A callback triggered every time an Order is updated status to "inProgress" (Description)

<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"request"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"orderId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"123"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"timestamp"} required={false} schemaName={"date-time"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","format":"date-time","example":"2018-10-19T16:46:45Z"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"status"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"inProgress"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"application/xml"} value={"application/xml"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"orderId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"123"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs label={"Callbacks Responses"} id={"callbacks-responses"}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

Callback successfully processed and no retries will be performed

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"someProp"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"123"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"someProp\": \"123\"\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"299"} value={"299"}><div>

Response for cancelling subscription

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"500"} value={"500"}><div>

Callback processing failed and retries will be performed

</div><div></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"PUT orderInProgress"} value={"put-orderInProgress"}><MethodEndpoint method={"put"} path={"{$request.body#/callbackUrl}?event={$request.body#/eventName}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Order in Progress (Only Description)

A callback triggered every time an Order is shipped to the recipient
